game.name: Irony Of Nightmare
game.shortDescription: In the Irony of Nightmare things aren't always as they seem. Those who decide to solve all puzzles of the game, not only will unravel true secret of house, but also will open completely different ending of the story.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the Irony of Nightmare things aren't always as they seem. Those who decide to solve all puzzles of the game, not only will unravel true secret of house, but also will open completely different ending of the story.

reviewHighlights.text: This game turns clunky movement, jump scares, and 'was that supposed to happen?' moments into the core gameplay loop. Grab it for a dollar and play it...
Pretty fun game, definitely worth the ending. Although kinda confusing to get there. Its worth it for a dollar.
